title: How to Dunk the Cookie on Cookie Clicker: Easy Tutorial

steps.title: Open up the Cookie Clicker website.
steps.content: Open up the Cookie Clicker website . If you don’t have it open already, navigate to the Cookie Clicker game page . On the left side of the screen, you’ll see the Big Cookie hovering above a sea of white milk. You should also see a middle section, which is mostly where you’ll see notifications and new achievements, and a rightmost section that’s labeled with “Store.”

steps.title: Unlock three other achievements first.
steps.content: Unlock three other achievements first. To make the Cookie Dunker achievement unlockable, you’ll need to unlock three other achievements first. These are the three easiest achievements to unlock when you’re first starting out in the game: What’s in a name? – Look for the name of your bakery on the left side of your screen above the cookie count. Click on your bakery’s name, and type over it with any name you like. Click Confirm to earn this achievement. Tiny cookie – Click the “Stats” button in the center panel. Look for the text “Cookies baked (all time).” Click on the tiny cookie image next to that text. If that doesn’t work, find and click the two other tiny cookie icons on the page. Wake and bake - Click the Big Cookie one time.

steps.title: Shrink your browser window until it looks like the Milk is touching the Cookie.
steps.content: Shrink your browser window until it looks like the Milk is touching the Cookie. Make sure your browser isn’t in full screen. Then, place your cursor over one corner of the window and click. Keep holding down your cursor and drag the sides of your browser window inward to make it smaller. Continue this process until it looks like the Milk at the bottom of the screen is touching the Big Cookie. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Hold the window for 2-3 seconds once your Milk and Big Cookie are touching.
steps.content: Hold the window for 2-3 seconds once your Milk and Big Cookie are touching. Now that you’ve resized your window so that the Cookie and Milk are touching (aka, it looks like your Big Cookie is being dunked in the milk), let it sit there for a few seconds. This will give the computer time to recognize that the cookie is being dunked.

steps.title: Maximize your window to its normal size to receive the achievement.
steps.content: Maximize your window to its normal size to receive the achievement. Return your browser window to its normal size. At this point, you should receive a notification from the game that you’ve unlocked the Cookie Dunker achievement. Congratulations!

steps.title: There’s no verified way to dunk the cookie on mobile, but it is possible.
steps.content: There’s no verified way to dunk the cookie on mobile, but it is possible. If you’re playing the web version of Cookie Clicker on your cell phone, it’s more difficult to dunk the cookie as you can’t resize your window. However, users have reported being able to unlock the achievement on mobile, but there doesn’t seem to be one straightforward route that’s worked for everyone. You can try rotating your screen to landscape view, or just try to unlock as many achievements as possible so that the milk level rises (you can hack the game to get there faster).

While some Cookie Clicker achievements feel nearly impossible to unlock, there are quite a few that are super simple and straightforward—so what are you waiting for? Check out the handy list below of the easiest achievements to showcase your Cookie Clicker mastery—as well as quick steps to unlock each one: What’s in a name?: Rename your bakery to any name of your choice. Tiny Cookie: Click one of the tiny cookie icons on the “Stats” page. Here You Go: Find your Achievements under “Stats.” Click the ? to the right of the scroll. Olden Days: Click on the tiny madeleine cookie icon in the “Info” tab. Wake and Bake: Click on the Big Cookie one time. Click: Buy 1 cursor. Double-click: Buy 2 cursors. Golden Cookie: Click on a golden cookie when it appears on your screen. Clicktastic: Bake 1,000 cookies in one game. Grandma's Cookies: Buy a Grandma. Just Wrong: Sell a Grandma. Tabloid Addiction: Click on the News Panel 50 times. My First Farm: Buy a farm.
